title: CarProof Canada Freebie: FREE Vehicle History (Alberta Only)
content:
If you’re living in Alberta and looking to learn the history of your current car, or the history of a car you’re thinking about purchasing, check out this offer from CarProof Canada . For a limited time only, residents of Alberta can enter their car’s VIN to get a free car history report ! Simply enter the VIN of a car registered in Alberta, and you’ll get your free car history report! Whether you’re looking to buy or sell a car, or are just curious about your car’s history, this is a great opportunity to get check out a vehicle’s history for free! 
 
This offer is available for a limited time only. Unfortunately this offer only seems to be available to residents of Alberta. 
 
Click here to get your free CarProof Report.
source: Canadian Freebies, Coupons, Deals, Bargains, Flyers, Contests Canada
